response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high quality and unique features, I estimate its value to be well above $8,000. Considering this, I would like to propose a special introductory price of $12,000 for you. This offer includes a comprehensive setup service and a 1-year warranty. I'm confident that this investment will pay off in terms of efficiency gains and cost savings. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.", "product_price": 12000}
